text: Vladlen Naumenko (; 5 November 1947) is a former professional Soviet football midfielder and coach. Football Championship of the Ukrainian SSR * Winner (2): 1968 (Avanhard),Sieryi, V. Two hundred games in the life of Vladlen Naumenko (Двести матчей из жизни Владлена Науменко). Nikolayevskiye novosti. 5 November 2007. 1974 (Sudnobudivnyk) ==References == ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Orsha Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Avanhard Ternopil players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Ordabasy players Category:FC Zvezda Tiraspol players Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:FC Zimbru Chișinău players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:MFC Mykolaiv managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vladlen Naumenko
